{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Die-cast toy {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Die-cast toy A die-cast toy is a toy or a collectible model produced by using the die casting method of putting molten lead or zinc alloy in a mold to produce a particular shape. Such toys are made of metal, with plastic, rubber, glass, or other machined metal parts. Wholly plastic toys are made by a similar process of injection moulding, but the two methods are distinct because of the properties of the materials. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Die-cast toy)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
